statements: SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, quantity_on_hand FROM products WHERE quantity_on_hand > 10;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM products ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE quantity_on_hand < reorder_point OR reorder_point IS NULL;
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity_on_hand FROM products WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM products WHERE quantity_on_hand > 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity_on_hand FROM products WHERE reorder_point IS NULL;
SELECT product_name, quantity_on_hand FROM products WHERE quantity_on_hand BETWEEN 20 AND 50 ORDER BY quantity_on_hand ASC, product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, reorder_point FROM products WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%' AND quantity_on_hand > 0;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE quantity_on_hand < reorder_point OR reorder_point IS NULL ORDER BY quantity_on_hand DESC, product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, quantity_on_hand FROM products WHERE quantity_on_hand > 10;
SELECT product_name, reorder_point FROM products ORDER BY reorder_point DESC;
SELECT product_name, location, quantity FROM products JOIN inventory ON products.product_id = inventory.product_id WHERE location = 'Warehouse';
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity FROM products JOIN inventory ON products.product_id = inventory.product_id WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity_on_hand FROM products WHERE quantity_on_hand > 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT product_name, quantity, location FROM products JOIN inventory ON products.product_id = inventory.product_id WHERE quantity > reorder_point
SELECT product_name, quantity_on_hand, reorder_point FROM products WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY reorder_point DESC
SELECT location, count(*) AS total_products FROM inventory GROUP BY location HAVING total_products > 3 ORDER BY total_products DESC
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, quantity_on_hand FROM products WHERE quantity_on_hand < 10;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity_on_hand, reorder_point FROM products WHERE reorder_point > 20;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person FROM suppliers WHERE contact_person IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, quantity_on_hand FROM products WHERE quantity_on_hand < reorder_point;
SELECT product_name, supplier_name FROM products JOIN suppliers ON products.product_id = suppliers.supplier_id;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers WHERE contact_person LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC, quantity_ordered ASC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, quantity_on_hand FROM products WHERE quantity_on_hand > 10;
SELECT product_name, supplier_name FROM products p JOIN suppliers s ON p.product_id = s.supplier_id;
SELECT product_name, order_quantity, order_date FROM products p JOIN orders o ON p.product_id = o.product_id;
SELECT product_name, quantity_change, change_date FROM products p JOIN inventory_history ih ON p.product_id = ih.product_id;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_name DESC, quantity_on_hand ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 2;
SELECT product_name, quantity_on_hand FROM products WHERE quantity_on_hand < reorder_point_threshold AND quantity_on_hand <> 0;

SELECT orders.order_id, products.product_name, suppliers.supplier_name, orders.order_quantity FROM orders JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id JOIN suppliers ON orders.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id WHERE orders.order_quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM inventory_history WHERE change_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY change_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE quantity_on_hand > 0;
SELECT name, quantity_on_hand FROM products ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, quantity_on_hand FROM products WHERE quantity_on_hand < reorder_point;
SELECT suppliers.name, suppliers.address, orders.quantity_ordered FROM suppliers JOIN orders ON suppliers.id = orders.supplier_id;
SELECT product_id, sum(quantity_ordered) AS total_ordered FROM orders GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_ordered > 100;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE quantity_on_hand > 100 ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT suppliers.name, orders.order_date, products.name AS product_name FROM suppliers JOIN orders ON suppliers.id = orders.supplier_id JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.id

SELECT products.name, suppliers.name AS supplier_name, orders.quantity_ordered FROM products JOIN orders ON products.id = orders.product_id JOIN suppliers ON suppliers.id = orders.supplier_id WHERE suppliers.address LIKE '%Street%'
SELECT notifications.notification_type, notifications.message FROM notifications JOIN orders ON notifications.order_id = orders.id WHERE notifications.notification_type = 'Urgent'
SELECT warehouses.location, COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM warehouses JOIN orders ON orders.product_id IN (SELECT id FROM products WHERE quantity_on_hand < reorder_point) GROUP BY warehouses.location
